ArgonTest.Name: Swap tuple twice
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
proc printTuple(a: String, b: String): Unit do puts a puts b end
def swapTuple(a: String, b: String): (String, String) = b, a
proc main(): Unit do val tupleValue: (String, String) = '1', '2' printTuple (swapTuple (swapTuple tupleValue)) end
